manifest.name: Science Explorer Pack
manifest.author: Donegeon Team
manifest.description: Conduct experiments and learn about the world with these science-themed quests.

quests.title: Kitchen Chemistry
quests.description: Perform a simple and safe science experiment using kitchen supplies (e.g., vinegar and baking soda volcano).

quests.title: Stargazing
quests.description: Identify three constellations in the night sky.

quests.title: The Botanist
quests.description: Identify three different types of plants in your yard or a park.

quests.title: Build a Simple Machine
quests.description: Create a simple lever, pulley, or inclined plane and demonstrate how it works.

quests.title: Weather Watcher
quests.description: Keep a log of the weather (temperature, clouds, precipitation) for three days.

quests.title: Animal Researcher
quests.description: Learn and share five interesting facts about an animal of your choice.

markets.title: The Inventor's Workshop
markets.description: Tools and gear for the aspiring scientist.

gameAssets.name: Lab Coat
gameAssets.description: A crisp, white lab coat for your avatar.

gameAssets.name: Safety Goggles
gameAssets.description: Protect your avatar's eyes during important experiments.

gameAssets.name: Science Kit
gameAssets.description: A real-world reward: a basic science experiment kit.
